She always had a way of getting her way, 
we could never work out if I wasn't willin' to change. 
It was always my hair, my clothes, my hats, 
hated my job, my dog, my dad, 
even the way that I say grace. 
I couldn't be me for so long, 
I feel free. Now that she's gone

I'm gonna grow my hair out 
and buy a harley get that tattoo that I've always wanted, 
take off work and not shave for a couple of weeks. 

Live my life with a simple mission, 
have more fun, do a lot more fishin', 
hang out with my boys cause' it's been too long. 
I'm gonna do whatever I want 
now that she's gone.
